tasks.task: Watching a video tutorial on future agriculture technologies
subtasks: Listening to speaker's introduction
Recognizing mention of Rio Tech channel
Understanding focus on transforming agriculture with technology
Considering discussion on smart farming technologies
Identification of smart farming components (sensors, drones, data analytics)
Appreciating the aim for efficiency and sustainability in farming
Learning about sustainable agriculture practices
Noting eco-friendly fertilizers and water conservation techniques
Exploring vertical farming as an innovative cultivation method
Observing space optimization in vertical farming
Considering precision agriculture methods (GPS, IoT, machinery)
Understanding the role of AI in monitoring crops and decision-making
Evaluating the overall impact of these technologies on agriculture
Following up on engagement (thumbs up, subscribe, comments)

tasks.task: Considering the relevance to physical farming tasks
subtasks: Assessing the degree to which discussed topics relate to manual labor in agriculture
Noting aspects that may indirectly influence manual tasks (e.g., data analysis, AI decision-making)
Concluding that while the video discusses future technologies, the explicit physical tasks performed by farmers are minimized or not directly addressed
